testcase.name: Security NFR: Authentication & Authorization › unauthenticated users cannot access protected routes
Security NFR: Authentication & Authorization › unauthenticated users cannot access host routes
Security NFR: Authentication & Authorization › unauthenticated users cannot access protected API routes
Security NFR: Authentication & Authorization › passwords are never logged or exposed in errors
Security NFR: Authentication & Authorization › SQL injection attempts are blocked
Security NFR: Authentication & Authorization › XSS attempts are sanitized
Security NFR: Authentication & Authorization › authentication tokens expire after session timeout
Security NFR: Authorization (RBAC) › users cannot access admin routes without admin role
Security NFR: Authorization (RBAC) › host users cannot access tenant-only routes
Security NFR: Data Protection › sensitive data is not exposed in client-side code
Security NFR: Data Protection › HTTPS is enforced in production
Security NFR: Error Handling › error messages do not expose sensitive information
